helmet.title: DOMUS - Services
helmet.description: Try our tools to sell and buy properties

newAd.preCardText: Are you a private individual or a real estate agency?
newAd.title: insert now a new ad!
newAd.infoText: Call at 0289623520! Monday - Friday 09.00 - 21.00 . Or write an email to: domus@casa.it

assessProperty.preCardText: Do you wont to sell but don't know the right price for your property?
assessProperty.title: assess now your property'!
assessProperty.infoText: Now you can assess your property directly from our site. Or by calling our operators at: 0289623520.
